Entertainments for Lent first written in French and translated into English by Sir B.B. Sagesse évangélique pour les sacrez entretiens du Caresme. English Caussin, Nicolas, 1583-1651. Brook, Basil, Sir, 1576-1646?
[8], 230 p.
Printed for I.W., and are to be sold by Philemon Stephens ..., London : 1661.
Translation of authors: Sagesse évangélique pour les sacrez entretiens du Caresme. Imperfect: stained, torn, tightly bound, with print show-through and loss of print. Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
=======
